snippet: The novelist says incorporating her real-life friends in fiction was difficult, but "in the end we were all okay."
abstract: The novelist says incorporating her real-life friends in fiction was difficult, but "in the end we were all okay."

headline.main: Drawn From Life: Sheila Heti Talks About "How Should a Person Be?"
headline.print_headline: A Word With: Sheila Heti: The Real Hip Artists Of Toronto
